FuncDef: The display srv6-te policy traffic-statistics command is used to query the SRv6 TE Policy traffic statistics count.
CLIs: display srv6-te policy traffic-statistics [ endpoint <endpoint-ip> color <color-value> | policy-name <name-value> | binding-sid <binding-sid> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the endpoint of an SRv6 TE Policy.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Specifies the color value of an SRv6 TE Policy.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 4294967295.

Specifies the name of an SRv6 TE Policy.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Specifies a binding SID.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Examples: Last -- seconds output rate -- bits/sec, -- packets/sec
Realtime -- seconds output rate -- bits/sec, -- packets/sec
Last -- seconds output rate -- bits/sec, -- packets/sec
Realtime -- seconds output rate -- bits/sec, -- packets/sec
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display srv6-te policy traffic-statistics command is used to query the SRv6 TE Policy traffic statistics count.
